hero.title: Master English with a Personal Coach
hero.subtitle: Achieve your goals with tailored one‑on‑one lessons designed for your needs

about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m an experienced English teacher for adults who want to accomplish more: advance their careers, relocate abroad, or complete specialized training. I help each student reach their unique language goals, whether it’s improving overall fluency and confidence or tackling short‑term challenges like mastering English tenses once and for all.

personalized.title: Personalized Approach
personalized.description: Every lesson plan is customized to your goals, needs, and learning style.

flexible.title: Flexible Schedule
flexible.description: Pick lesson times that fit your busy life and choose between full‑hour or 30‑minute sessions multiple times per week.

practical.title: Practical Focus
practical.description: Learn the English you need for real‑world situations, tailored to your profession and objectives.

progress.title: Measurable Progress
progress.description: Receive regular feedback and tracking tools to monitor your progress and adjust the program as needed.

step1.title: Initial Assessment
step1.description: We begin with a comprehensive evaluation of your current English level, goals, and learning preferences.

step2.title: Custom Program Design
step2.description: I design a personalized curriculum focused on your objectives and skill gaps, from “speaking fluently” to “understanding native speakers.”

step3.title: One‑on‑One Sessions
step3.description: Each lesson is crafted specifically for you. It’s an integrated system, not stand‑alone classes, to reinforce and build on learned material.

step4.title: Ongoing Adaptation
step4.description: Your program evolves as you progress, ensuring tasks remain at the right level of challenge.

testimonial1.text: I’m always amazed at how thoroughly you prepare each lesson and choose materials that suit me perfectly. Not a single day do I regret starting: I speak more freely, use new grammar structures, and finally watch series in English. I think faster, form sentences quicker, and respond more promptly. I feel more confident speaking English.
testimonial1.author: Ekaterina, Marketer

testimonial2.text: Each lesson was engaging and rich in content because we discussed topics I’m truly interested in. Thanks to the relaxed atmosphere and informal style, I felt confident and expressed my thoughts more freely in English. Our interesting conversations greatly expanded my vocabulary, which positively impacted my skills.
testimonial2.author: Dmitry, IT Specialist

testimonial3.text: There’s no feeling of overload or fatigue in classes. Lessons are organized with modern techniques and an individual approach. I finally managed to start speaking and understanding English because the material isn’t taught in a “template” fashion.
testimonial3.author: Maria, Graphic Designer

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you visit or submit information through this website.
privacyPolicy.informationCollectText: When you visit the site, we automatically collect certain device information, including your web browser, IP address, time zone, and cookies. We also track how you interact with the site and which pages you view.
privacyPolicy.personalInfoText: When you fill out the application form, we collect personal information you provide, such as name, email, phone number, and learning goals or experience.
privacyPolicy.useInfoText: We use collected information to communicate with you, process your application, and provide personalized English coaching services. We may also use it to improve our website and services.
privacyPolicy.shareInfoText: We only share your information when necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, or protect our rights.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We will retain your personal information as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy or until you request deletion.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this policy periodically to reflect changes in practices or for legal reasons.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For questions about this policy or to lodge a complaint, please contact us at the email provided on our website.
